quote_first: “Samantha?” I can hear Trish approaching. “Um ... hold on!” I hurry to the door, trying to block her view. “It's already
quote_last: ,” I can hear her saying a little sharply. “And I did ask, most clearly for ...” Her voice trails off into silence as she reaches the kitchen door, and her whole face sags in astonishment. I turn and follow her gaze as she surveys the endless plates of sandwiches. “My goodness!” At last Trish finds her voice. “This is ... this is very impressive!”
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_last: Alleyn opened the outer door, knocked his pipe out on the edge of the stone step,and remained staring out on to the drive.
title: A Man Lay Dead
author: Ngaio Marsh
